game.name: EZ-Crosshair
game.genres: Action, Indie, Animation & Modeling, Design & Illustration, Utilities
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Workshop, Partial Controller Support
game.shortDescription: Enhance your gaming precision with EZ-Crosshair, a user-friendly app providing customizable crosshair overlays for a personalized and immersive gaming experience.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Enhance your gaming precision with EZ-Crosshair, a user-friendly app providing customizable crosshair overlays for a personalized and immersive gaming experience.

reviewHighlights.text: Fantastic crosshairs. i love being able to have it animated
